channel.title: Need help with Project Czar Final!
channel.description:
Please guys! If you used the base released by Kihomura
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,353935.0.html
I need some help adding NPC drops and Shops!!! When ive edited shop list, i search
wannashop (or along those lines... Can't remember exact thing atm)
And it doesn't find ANYTHING!!
Please tell me where to add the void so i can use my shops! ~Johno

item.title: Need help with Project Czar Final!
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

What im saying, i don’t have anything to do with

WannaShop

SO i need to know where to put the viod! @@

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Project Czar Final!

item.title: Need help with Project Czar Final!
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

When i do shops, i usuallu delete everything from shops.cfg. and then i go into client.java and delete all the wanneshop’s. then make my own. so if u wanna try that. make a backup of your server. go into client.java and delete all your wanneshop and add a new one. should look like what i posted.

Heres my shops. simple and easy.
NOTE : im on delta base.
if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; } if (NPCID == 521) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; } if (NPCID == 522) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 3; } if (NPCID == 523) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; } if (NPCID == 524) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } if (NPCID == 525) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 6; }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Project Czar Final!

item.title: Need help with Project Czar Final!
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

[quote=“EatU4Dinner, post:5, topic:270905”]this is what you should have for shops

Client.Java

if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; }

AutoSpawn.Cfg

spawn = 520	3094	3499	0	0	0	0	0	1

Shops.Cfg

shop = 1	shop1				2	2

I need to add the bit in client.java, but where??

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Project Czar Final!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Ooh just found this

[code]}

if (WanneShop > 0) {
	if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) {
		openUpShop(WanneShop);
		WanneShop = 0;
	}[/code]

Now what do i do?
